com.xhive.core.interfaces
Interface XhiveGroupIf

public interface XhiveGroupIf

A XhiveGroupIf represents a collection of XhiveUserIf objects.

All groups of a XhiveDatabaseIf object are stored in the XhiveGroupListIf. A XhiveUserIf can belong to multiple groups. Every XhiveGroupIf object has a unique group name. The purpose of groups is to organise authority on documents and queries. The administrator manages XhiveGroupIf objects.

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

Since:
X-Hive/DB 1.0
